availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry S. Pickett (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of W. Pickett and M. Pickett. Married Susan A. Pickett. Father of F. G. Pickett, Armelia Pickett, Martha A. Pickett, America A. Pickett, Mary J. Pickett, and Henry S. Pickett. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 266. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts, p. 60. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 8, p. 30. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Ballard County, Deaths, 1876, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
